name: Development Hell (Felipe Rocha)
description:
Your game has been announced, but your creative block has been so bad that you might have to delay its release. This would be terrible, as there are few things worse than a game that is always "Coming Soon" but never gets here. Your goal is to go through the 9 circles of Development Hell, adding new elements to your game at each step. Just beware of the development devils, or you might have to postpone your release.

Made for Unity Game Jam
